oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Baboons are also said to assemble together and play at the =gebbi-ggu, at night, like the Bushmen, singing like the Bushman women, and imitating the songs which they have heard the people sing. (L V.-25. 5998-6005). =gebbi-ggu
